subject: Discrimination
Homosexuality
Softball
Suits and Litigation
lead_paragraph: A gay softball organization agreed to pay an undisclosed sum to three players who were disqualified from the 2008 Gay Softball World Series because of their perceived heterosexuality.
snippet: A gay softball organization agreed to pay an undisclosed sum to three players who were disqualified from the 2008 Gay Softball World Series because of their perceived heterosexuality.
